GSD.product_version: versions from v4.20 to before v5.10.166
GSD.description:
net/sched: sch_taprio: fix possible use-after-free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.166 by commit c60fe70078d6e515f424cb868d07e00411b27fbc, it was introduced in version v4.20 by commit 5a781ccbd19e4664babcbe4b4ead7aa2b9283d22. For more details please see the references link.
